description: Gets the NotificationConfiguration for a given Kinesis video stream.

nested_items.name: NotificationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The structure that contains the information required for notifications. If the structure is null, the configuration will be deleted from the stream.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates if a notification configuration is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: DestinationConfig
nested_items.description: The destination information required to deliver a notification to a customer.

nested_items.name: Uri
nested_items.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the images will be delivered.
